meanings.definition: To use or develop (something) to achieve a desired result
meanings.sent1: She parlayed her artistic skills into a successful career.
meanings.sent2: He parlayed his love for cooking into a catering business.
meanings.sent3: The magician parlayed his tricks into a full-time job.
meanings.sent4: The student parlayed his study habits into straight A's.
meanings.sent5: She parlayed her passion for animals into a thriving pet-sitting business.

meanings.definition: To bet or gamble with (something) and then use the winnings to bet or gamble again
meanings.sent1: He parlayed his small winnings into a big fortune at the casino.
meanings.sent2: She parlayed her luck at the races into even more winnings.
meanings.sent3: The gambler parlayed his initial bet into a series of wins.
meanings.sent4: The poker player parlayed a lucky hand into a winning streak.
meanings.sent5: They parlayed their successful bet into a luxurious vacation.
